name: pharmacy_get_all_medicines
description:
Get all medicines in the pharmacy catalog.

Args:
    limit: Maximum number of medicines to return (default 100)

Returns:
    List of all medicines in the catalog

name: pharmacy_get_medicine_by_id
description:
Get detailed information about a specific medicine.

Args:
    medicine_id: The unique ID of the medicine

Returns:
    Medicine details or error if not found

name: pharmacy_search_medicines_by_name
description:
Search for medicines by name (brand or generic name).

Args:
    name_query: Search term to match against medicine names
    limit: Maximum number of results (default 20)

Returns:
    List of matching medicines

name: pharmacy_search_medicines_by_ailment
description:
Search for medicines that treat a specific ailment or condition.

Args:
    ailment: The ailment/condition to search for (e.g., "headache", "cold", "diabetes")
    limit: Maximum number of results (default 20)

Returns:
    List of medicines that treat the specified ailment

name: pharmacy_search_medicines_by_ingredient
description:
Search for medicines by active ingredient.

Args:
    ingredient: The active ingredient to search for (e.g., "acetaminophen", "ibuprofen")
    limit: Maximum number of results (default 20)

Returns:
    List of medicines containing the specified ingredient

name: pharmacy_search_medicines
description:
Search medicines with multiple filters.

Args:
    query: General search term (matches name, generic name, description, ingredients)
    category: Filter by category (e.g., "Pain Relief", "Antibiotics")
    ailment: Filter by ailment/condition treated
    form: Filter by medicine form (e.g., "Tablet", "Capsule", "Liquid")
    max_price: Maximum price filter
    otc_only: Only show over-the-counter (non-prescription) medicines
    in_stock_only: Only show medicines currently in stock
    limit: Maximum number of results (default 20)

Returns:
    List of matching medicines

name: pharmacy_get_medicines_in_stock
description:
Get all medicines that are currently in stock.

Args:
    limit: Maximum number of medicines to return (default 100)

Returns:
    List of medicines with stock > 0

name: pharmacy_get_medicines_out_of_stock
description:
Get all medicines that are currently out of stock.

Args:
    limit: Maximum number of medicines to return (default 100)

Returns:
    List of medicines with stock = 0

name: pharmacy_get_otc_medicines
description:
Get all over-the-counter (non-prescription) medicines.

Args:
    limit: Maximum number of medicines to return (default 100)

Returns:
    List of OTC medicines

name: pharmacy_get_prescription_medicines
description:
Get all medicines that require a prescription.

Args:
    limit: Maximum number of medicines to return (default 100)

Returns:
    List of prescription-required medicines

name: pharmacy_get_medicines_by_category
description:
Get medicines by category.

Args:
    category: Category to filter by (e.g., "Pain Relief", "Antibiotics", "Vitamins")
    limit: Maximum number of results (default 50)

Returns:
    List of medicines in the specified category

name: pharmacy_get_medicines_by_form
description:
Get medicines by form/type.

Args:
    form: Medicine form to filter by (e.g., "Tablet", "Capsule", "Liquid", "Cream")
    limit: Maximum number of results (default 50)

Returns:
    List of medicines in the specified form

name: pharmacy_get_categories
description:
Get all available medicine categories.

Returns:
    List of unique categories

name: pharmacy_get_medicine_forms
description:
Get all available medicine forms (tablet, capsule, liquid, etc.).

Returns:
    List of unique medicine forms

name: pharmacy_get_ailments
description:
Get all ailments/conditions that medicines in the catalog can treat.

Returns:
    List of ailments/conditions

name: pharmacy_get_manufacturers
description:
Get all medicine manufacturers in the catalog.

Returns:
    List of unique manufacturers

name: pharmacy_get_current_user
description:
Get the current logged-in customer's profile information.

Returns information about the currently authenticated customer including
their name, email, insurance information, and known allergies.

Returns:
    User profile with user_id, name, email, phone, insurance info, and allergies

name: pharmacy_check_availability
description:
Check if a medicine is available in the requested quantity.

Args:
    medicine_id: The unique ID of the medicine
    quantity: Number of units needed (default 1)

Returns:
    Availability status, stock information, and prescription requirements

name: pharmacy_buy_medicine
description:
Purchase one or more units of a medicine for the current user.

This decreases the stock level and records the purchase under
the currently logged-in user's account.

Args:
    medicine_id: The unique ID of the medicine to purchase
    quantity: Number of units to buy (default 1)
    prescription_verified: Set to True if prescription has been verified (required for Rx medicines)

Returns:
    Purchase confirmation or error message

name: pharmacy_get_purchase_history
description:
Get the current user's medicine purchase history.

Returns the purchase history for the currently logged-in user,
showing all medicines they have bought.

Args:
    limit: Maximum number of records to return (default 50)

Returns:
    List of purchase records with medicine details

name: pharmacy_get_purchase_stats
description:
Get purchase statistics for the current user.

Returns statistics about the currently logged-in user's purchases,
including total transactions, items bought, money spent, and their top purchases.

Returns:
    Statistics including total transactions, items bought, total spent, and top medicines
